divs: Sighting DetailsThis is not my story perse. But I do have the audio tape of the fellow who hadthe visitors for 3 12 days while they were fixing some equipment. This is1950......before computers. But the description looks like a computer screen andprintout of the ailing ufo vehicle.They were humanoid. The only differnce wasthe smaller hands and sborter arms.They spoke with gutteral sounds mixed withclicks. Lots more to tell
